meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rectilinear.
meanings.sent1: The rectilinearity of the building's design made it look very modern.
meanings.sent2: The artist emphasized rectilinearity in his abstract painting.
meanings.sent3: The rectilinearity of the maze made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent4: Her strict rectilinearity in following the rules earned her the nickname 'Straight Arrow'.
meanings.sent5: The rectilinearity of the horizon against the sky was striking.

meanings.definition: The property of having straight lines.
meanings.sent1: The rectilinearity of the table made it easy to fit in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The architect focused on rectilinearity when designing the office building.
meanings.sent3: The rectilinearity of the road made it perfect for skateboarding.
meanings.sent4: The rectilinearity of the barcode ensured quick and accurate scanning.
meanings.sent5: The rectilinearity of the fence created a sense of order in the garden.
